Package odometry

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LCDInfo
    Constantly update LCD with the all the robot`s information
    LightData
    Retrieve readings from a light sensor and confirms when a line has been detected.
    Odometer
    Odometer class modified for our robot
    OdometryAngleCorrection
    Thread that corrects angle of odometer from two light sensors on the sides
    OdometryCorrection
    Thread to correct the position
